issue.title: VisualPlugins not registering SDF elements (Gazebo2, Indigo) -> (Gazebo7, Kinetic)

content.raw:
@davetcoleman Sorry! I missed your last message. You're correct. I meant Gazebo 7.5.0, installed from OSRF repositories. 

While the issue you reported exists in both Gazebo 7 and Gazebo 7.5 (deprecation warning), the issue reported in this thread (plugin elements such as robotNamespace etc. not being read) does go away after the update.
content.html:
@davetcoleman Sorry! I missed your last message. You're correct. I meant Gazebo 7.5.0, installed from OSRF repositories.

While the issue you reported exists in both Gazebo 7 and Gazebo 7.5 (deprecation warning), the issue reported in this thread (plugin elements such as robotNamespace etc. not being read) does go away after the update.
